Summary Note:
Laura Josephine Lykke and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Copenhagen. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Laura Josephine Lykke is a 64 year old retired Investment Director from Denmark.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons she decided to join.
Family Background: Laura Josephine Lykke is married to Pedersen. Laura and Pedersen have 3 children, named Rasmussen, Ida and Krog.
Education Background:
Laura finished secondary school at Rysensteen Gymnasium in 1978.
Laura finished her studies at CBS International Business School in 1984.
Occupation History:
Laura Josephine Lykke is a 64 year old retired Investment Director from Denmark.
In 1985, Laura Josephine Lykke started working as a Analyst at Axcel Management A/S, marking the beginning of her successful career.
At KKR & Co. Danmark A/S, she held the position of Associate from 1992 to 1995, making significant contributions to the organization.
Her tenure as a Investment Director at Advent International Danmark A/S from 1996 till retirement was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 6720000 DKK, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She owns flat in Aarhus, where she resides. It is worth 1155000 DKK.

She purchased townhouse in Slagelse, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 1888000 DKK.
Moreover, she has invested in additional property in Gentofte, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The villa is valued at 2490000 DKK.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Laura as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
